abstract: The 19 biggest banks may have passed the Treasury’s stress tests on how they would weather a deep recession, but Standard & Poor’s, the credit rating agency, thinks that many banks are far from a recovery and that the banking crisis has merely entered a new phase.

lead_paragraph: The 19 biggest banks may have passed the Treasury’s stress tests on how they would weather a deep recession, but Standard & Poor’s, the credit rating agency, thinks that many banks are far from a recovery and that the banking crisis has merely entered a new phase.

headline.main: S.&P. Warns of Further Challenges for Banks
